00094 /***************************************************************************/
00157 void AES_CBC128(uint8_t *out,
00158                 const uint8_t *in,
00159                 unsigned int len,
00160                 const uint8_t *key,
00161                 const uint8_t *iv,
00162                 bool encrypt)
00163 {
00164   int            i;
00165   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00166   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00167   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
00168   const uint32_t *_iv  = (const uint32_t *)iv;
00169   /* Need to buffer one block when decrypting in case 'out' replaces 'in' */
00170   uint32_t       prev[4];
00171 
00172   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
00173 
00174   /* Number of blocks to process */
00175   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
00176 
00177   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00178   if (key)
00179   {
00180     /* Load key into high key for key buffer usage */
00181     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00182     {
00183       AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00184     }
00185   }
00186   #endif
00187 
00188   if (encrypt)
00189   {
00190     /* Enable encryption with auto start using XOR */
00191     #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00192     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN | AES_CTRL_XORSTART;
00193     #else
00194     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_XORSTART;
00195     #endif
00196 
00197     /* Load initialization vector, since writing to DATA, it will */
00198     /* not trigger encryption. */
00199     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00200     {
00201       AES->DATA = __REV(_iv[i]);
00202     }
00203 
00204     /* Encrypt data */
00205     while (len--)
00206     {
00207       #if !defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00208       /* Load key */
00209       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00210       {
00211         AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[i]);
00212       }
00213       #endif
00214 
00215       /* Load data and trigger encryption */
00216       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00217       {
00218         AES->XORDATA = __REV(_in[i]);
00219       }
00220       _in += 4;
00221 
00222       /* Wait for completion */
00223       while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00224         ;
00225 
00226       /* Save encrypted data */
00227       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00228       {
00229         _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA);
00230       }
00231       _out += 4;
00232     }
00233   }
00234   else
00235   {
00236     /* Select decryption mode */
00237     #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00238     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DECRYPT | AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00239     #else
00240     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DECRYPT | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00241     #endif
00242 
00243     /* Copy init vector to previous buffer to avoid special handling */
00244     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00245     {
00246       prev[i] = _iv[i];
00247     }
00248 
00249     /* Decrypt data */
00250     while (len--)
00251     {
00252       #if !defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00253       /* Load key */
00254       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00255       {
00256         AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[i]);
00257       }
00258       #endif
00259 
00260       /* Load data and trigger decryption */
00261       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00262       {
00263         AES->DATA = __REV(_in[i]);
00264       }
00265 
00266       /* Wait for completion */
00267       while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00268         ;
00269 
00270       /* In order to avoid additional buffer, we use HW directly for XOR and buffer */
00271       /* (Writing to XORDATA will not trigger encoding, triggering enabled on DATA.) */
00272       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00273       {
00274         AES->XORDATA = __REV(prev[i]);
00275         prev[i]      = _in[i];
00276       }
00277       _in += 4;
00278 
00279       /* Then fetch decrypted data, we have to do it in a separate loop */
00280       /* due to internal auto-shifting of words */
00281       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00282       {
00283         _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA);
00284       }
00285       _out += 4;
00286     }
00287   }
00288 }

00292 /***************************************************************************/
00322 void AES_CBC256(uint8_t *out,
00323                 const uint8_t *in,
00324                 unsigned int len,
00325                 const uint8_t *key,
00326                 const uint8_t *iv,
00327                 bool encrypt)
00328 {
00329   int            i;
00330   int            j;
00331   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00332   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00333   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
00334   const uint32_t *_iv  = (const uint32_t *)iv;
00335   /* Need to buffer one block when decrypting in case output replaces input */
00336   uint32_t       prev[4];
00337 
00338   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
00339 
00340   /* Number of blocks to process */
00341   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
00342 
00343   if (encrypt)
00344   {
00345     /* Enable encryption with auto start using XOR */
00346     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256 | AES_CTRL_XORSTART;
00347 
00348     /* Load initialization vector, since writing to DATA, it will */
00349     /* not trigger encryption. */
00350     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00351     {
00352       AES->DATA = __REV(_iv[i]);
00353     }
00354 
00355     /* Encrypt data */
00356     while (len--)
00357     {
00358       /* Load key and data and trigger encryption */
00359       for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
00360       {
00361         AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[j]);
00362         AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00363         /* Write data last, since will trigger encryption on last iteration */
00364         AES->XORDATA = __REV(_in[i]);
00365       }
00366       _in += 4;
00367 
00368       /* Wait for completion */
00369       while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00370         ;
00371 
00372       /* Save encrypted data */
00373       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00374       {
00375         _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA);
00376       }
00377       _out += 4;
00378     }
00379   }
00380   else
00381   {
00382     /* Select decryption mode */
00383     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256 | AES_CTRL_DECRYPT | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00384 
00385     /* Copy init vector to previous buffer to avoid special handling */
00386     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00387     {
00388       prev[i] = _iv[i];
00389     }
00390 
00391     /* Decrypt data */
00392     while (len--)
00393     {
00394       /* Load key and data and trigger decryption */
00395       for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
00396       {
00397         AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[j]);
00398         AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00399         /* Write data last, since will trigger encryption on last iteration */
00400         AES->DATA = __REV(_in[i]);
00401       }
00402 
00403       /* Wait for completion */
00404       while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00405         ;
00406 
00407       /* In order to avoid additional buffer, we use HW directly for XOR and buffer */
00408       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00409       {
00410         AES->XORDATA = __REV(prev[i]);
00411         prev[i]      = _in[i];
00412       }
00413       _in += 4;
00414 
00415       /* Then fetch decrypted data, we have to do it in a separate loop */
00416       /* due to internal auto-shifting of words */
00417       for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00418       {
00419         _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA);
00420       }
00421       _out += 4;
00422     }
00423   }
00424 }
00425 #endif

00428 /***************************************************************************/
00486 void AES_CFB128(uint8_t *out,
00487                 const uint8_t *in,
00488                 unsigned int len,
00489                 const uint8_t *key,
00490                 const uint8_t *iv,
00491                 bool encrypt)
00492 {
00493   int            i;
00494   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00495   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00496   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
00497   const uint32_t *_iv  = (const uint32_t *)iv;
00498   const uint32_t *data;
00499   uint32_t       tmp[4];
00500 
00501   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
00502 
00503   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00504   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00505   #else
00506   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00507   #endif
00508 
00509   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00510   /* Load key into high key for key buffer usage */
00511   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00512   {
00513     AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00514   }
00515   #endif
00516 
00517   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
00518   data = _iv;
00519   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
00520   while (len--)
00521   {
00522     #if !defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00523     /* Load key */
00524     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00525     {
00526       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[i]);
00527     }
00528     #endif
00529 
00530     /* Load data and trigger encryption */
00531     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00532     {
00533       AES->DATA = __REV(data[i]);
00534     }
00535 
00536     /* Do some required processing before waiting for completion */
00537     if (encrypt)
00538     {
00539       data = _out;
00540     }
00541     else
00542     {
00543       /* Must copy current ciphertext block since it may be overwritten */
00544       for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00545       {
00546         tmp[i] = _in[i];
00547       }
00548       data = tmp;
00549     }
00550 
00551     /* Wait for completion */
00552     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00553       ;
00554 
00555     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
00556     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00557     {
00558       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA) ^ _in[i];
00559     }
00560     _out += 4;
00561     _in  += 4;
00562   }
00563 }

00595 void AES_CFB256(uint8_t *out,
00596                 const uint8_t *in,
00597                 unsigned int len,
00598                 const uint8_t *key,
00599                 const uint8_t *iv,
00600                 bool encrypt)
00601 {
00602   int            i;
00603   int            j;
00604   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00605   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00606   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
00607   const uint32_t *_iv  = (const uint32_t *)iv;
00608   const uint32_t *data;
00609   uint32_t       tmp[4];
00610 
00611   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
00612 
00613   /* Select encryption mode */
00614   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256 | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00615 
00616   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
00617   data = _iv;
00618   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
00619   while (len--)
00620   {
00621     /* Load key and block to be encrypted/decrypted */
00622     for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
00623     {
00624       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[j]);
00625       AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00626       /* Write data last, since will trigger encryption on last iteration */
00627       AES->DATA = __REV(data[i]);
00628     }
00629 
00630     /* Do some required processing before waiting for completion */
00631     if (encrypt)
00632     {
00633       data = _out;
00634     }
00635     else
00636     {
00637       /* Must copy current ciphertext block since it may be overwritten */
00638       for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00639       {
00640         tmp[i] = _in[i];
00641       }
00642       data = tmp;
00643     }
00644 
00645     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00646       ;
00647 
00648     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
00649     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00650     {
00651       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA) ^ _in[i];
00652     }
00653     _out += 4;
00654     _in  += 4;
00655   }
00656 }

00660 /***************************************************************************/
00720 void AES_CTR128(uint8_t *out,
00721                 const uint8_t *in,
00722                 unsigned int len,
00723                 const uint8_t *key,
00724                 uint8_t *ctr,
00725                 AES_CtrFuncPtr_TypeDef ctrFunc)
00726 {
00727   int            i;
00728   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00729   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00730   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
00731   uint32_t       *_ctr = (uint32_t *)ctr;
00732 
00733   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
00734   EFM_ASSERT(ctrFunc);
00735 
00736   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00737   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00738   #else
00739   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00740   #endif
00741 
00742   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00743   if (key)
00744   {
00745     /* Load key into high key for key buffer usage */
00746     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00747     {
00748       AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00749     }
00750   }
00751   #endif
00752 
00753   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
00754   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
00755   while (len--)
00756   {
00757     #if !defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
00758     /* Load key */
00759     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00760     {
00761       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[i]);
00762     }
00763     #endif
00764 
00765     /* Load ctr to be encrypted/decrypted */
00766     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00767     {
00768       AES->DATA = __REV(_ctr[i]);
00769     }
00770     /* Increment ctr for next use */
00771     ctrFunc(ctr);
00772 
00773     /* Wait for completion */
00774     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00775       ;
00776 
00777     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
00778     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00779     {
00780       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA) ^ _in[i];
00781     }
00782     _out += 4;
00783     _in  += 4;
00784   }
00785 }

00788 #if defined( AES_CTRL_AES256 )
00789 /***************************************************************************/
00818 void AES_CTR256(uint8_t *out,
00819                 const uint8_t *in,
00820                 unsigned int len,
00821                 const uint8_t *key,
00822                 uint8_t *ctr,
00823                 AES_CtrFuncPtr_TypeDef ctrFunc)
00824 {
00825   int            i;
00826   int            j;
00827   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00828   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00829   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
00830   uint32_t       *_ctr = (uint32_t *)ctr;
00831 
00832   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
00833   EFM_ASSERT(ctrFunc);
00834 
00835   /* Select encryption mode, with auto trigger */
00836   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256 | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
00837 
00838   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
00839   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
00840   while (len--)
00841   {
00842     /* Load key and block to be encrypted/decrypted */
00843     for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
00844     {
00845       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[j]);
00846       AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
00847       /* Write data last, since will trigger encryption on last iteration */
00848       AES->DATA = __REV(_ctr[i]);
00849     }
00850     /* Increment ctr for next use */
00851     ctrFunc(ctr);
00852 
00853     /* Wait for completion */
00854     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00855       ;
00856 
00857     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
00858     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00859     {
00860       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA) ^ _in[i];
00861     }
00862     _out += 4;
00863     _in  += 4;
00864   }
00865 }
00866 #endif

00869 /***************************************************************************/
00883 void AES_CTRUpdate32Bit(uint8_t *ctr)
00884 {
00885   uint32_t *_ctr = (uint32_t *)ctr;
00886 
00887   _ctr[3] = __REV(__REV(_ctr[3]) + 1);
00888 }

00891 /***************************************************************************/
00906 void AES_DecryptKey128(uint8_t *out, const uint8_t *in)
00907 {
00908   int            i;
00909   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00910   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00911 
00912   /* Load key */
00913   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00914   {
00915     AES->KEYLA = __REV(_in[i]);
00916   }
00917 
00918   /* Do dummy encryption to generate decrypt key */
00919   AES->CTRL = 0;
00920   AES_IntClear(AES_IF_DONE);
00921   AES->CMD = AES_CMD_START;
00922 
00923   /* Wait for completion */
00924   while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00925     ;
00926 
00927   /* Save decryption key */
00928   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00929   {
00930     _out[i] = __REV(AES->KEYLA);
00931   }
00932 }
00933 
00934 
00935 #if defined( AES_CTRL_AES256 )
00936 /***************************************************************************/
00951 void AES_DecryptKey256(uint8_t *out, const uint8_t *in)
00952 {
00953   int            i;
00954   int            j;
00955   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
00956   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
00957 
00958   /* Load key */
00959   for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
00960   {
00961     AES->KEYLA = __REV(_in[j]);
00962     AES->KEYHA = __REV(_in[i]);
00963   }
00964 
00965   /* Do dummy encryption to generate decrypt key */
00966   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256;
00967   AES->CMD  = AES_CMD_START;
00968 
00969   /* Wait for completion */
00970   while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
00971     ;
00972 
00973   /* Save decryption key */
00974   for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
00975   {
00976     _out[j] = __REV(AES->KEYLA);
00977     _out[i] = __REV(AES->KEYHA);
00978   }
00979 }
00980 #endif
00981

00983 /***************************************************************************/
01034 void AES_ECB128(uint8_t *out,
01035                 const uint8_t *in,
01036                 unsigned int len,
01037                 const uint8_t *key,
01038                 bool encrypt)
01039 {
01040   int            i;
01041   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
01042   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
01043   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
01044 
01045   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
01046 
01047   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01048   /* Load key into high key for key buffer usage */
01049   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01050   {
01051     AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
01052   }
01053   #endif
01054 
01055   if (encrypt)
01056   {
01057     /* Select encryption mode */
01058     #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01059     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
01060     #else
01061     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
01062     #endif
01063   }
01064   else
01065   {
01066     /* Select decryption mode */
01067     #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01068     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DECRYPT | AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
01069     #else
01070     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DECRYPT | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
01071     #endif
01072   }
01073 
01074   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
01075   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
01076   while (len--)
01077   {
01078     #if !defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01079     /* Load key */
01080     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01081     {
01082       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[i]);
01083     }
01084     #endif
01085 
01086     /* Load block to be encrypted/decrypted */
01087     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01088     {
01089       AES->DATA = __REV(_in[i]);
01090     }
01091     _in += 4;
01092 
01093     /* Wait for completion */
01094     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
01095       ;
01096 
01097     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
01098     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01099     {
01100       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA);
01101     }
01102     _out += 4;
01103   }
01104 }

01107 #if defined( AES_CTRL_AES256 )
01108 /***************************************************************************/
01135 void AES_ECB256(uint8_t *out,
01136                 const uint8_t *in,
01137                 unsigned int len,
01138                 const uint8_t *key,
01139                 bool encrypt)
01140 {
01141   int            i;
01142   int            j;
01143   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
01144   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
01145   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
01146 
01147   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
01148 
01149   if (encrypt)
01150   {
01151     /* Select encryption mode */
01152     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256 | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
01153   }
01154   else
01155   {
01156     /* Select decryption mode */
01157     AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_DECRYPT | AES_CTRL_AES256 | AES_CTRL_DATASTART;
01158   }
01159 
01160   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
01161   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
01162   while (len--)
01163   {
01164     /* Load key and block to be encrypted/decrypted */
01165     for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
01166     {
01167       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[j]);
01168       AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
01169       /* Write data last, since will trigger encryption on last iteration */
01170       AES->DATA = __REV(_in[i]);
01171     }
01172     _in += 4;
01173 
01174     /* Wait for completion */
01175     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
01176       ;
01177 
01178     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
01179     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01180     {
01181       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA);
01182     }
01183     _out += 4;
01184   }
01185 }
01186 #endif
01187 
01188 
01189 /***************************************************************************/
01246 void AES_OFB128(uint8_t *out,
01247                 const uint8_t *in,
01248                 unsigned int len,
01249                 const uint8_t *key,
01250                 const uint8_t *iv)
01251 {
01252   int            i;
01253   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
01254   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
01255   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
01256   const uint32_t *_iv  = (const uint32_t *)iv;
01257 
01258   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
01259 
01260   /* Select encryption mode, trigger explicitly by command */
01261   #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01262   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN;
01263   #else
01264   AES->CTRL = 0;
01265   #endif
01266 
01267   /* Load key into high key for key buffer usage */
01268   /* Load initialization vector */
01269   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01270   {
01271     #if defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01272     AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
01273     #endif
01274     AES->DATA  = __REV(_iv[i]);
01275   }
01276 
01277   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
01278   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
01279   while (len--)
01280   {
01281     #if !defined( AES_CTRL_KEYBUFEN )
01282     /* Load key */
01283     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01284     {
01285       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[i]);
01286     }
01287     #endif
01288 
01289     AES->CMD = AES_CMD_START;
01290 
01291     /* Wait for completion */
01292     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
01293       ;
01294 
01295     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
01296     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01297     {
01298       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA) ^ _in[i];
01299     }
01300     _out += 4;
01301     _in  += 4;
01302   }
01303 }
01304 
01305 
01306 #if defined( AES_CTRL_AES256 )
01307 /***************************************************************************/
01332 void AES_OFB256(uint8_t *out,
01333                 const uint8_t *in,
01334                 unsigned int len,
01335                 const uint8_t *key,
01336                 const uint8_t *iv)
01337 {
01338   int            i;
01339   int            j;
01340   uint32_t       *_out = (uint32_t *)out;
01341   const uint32_t *_in  = (const uint32_t *)in;
01342   const uint32_t *_key = (const uint32_t *)key;
01343   const uint32_t *_iv  = (const uint32_t *)iv;
01344 
01345   EFM_ASSERT(!(len % AES_BLOCKSIZE));
01346 
01347   /* Select encryption mode, trigger explicitly by command */
01348   AES->CTRL = AES_CTRL_AES256;
01349 
01350   /* Load initialization vector */
01351   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01352   {
01353     AES->DATA = __REV(_iv[i]);
01354   }
01355 
01356   /* Encrypt/decrypt data */
01357   len /= AES_BLOCKSIZE;
01358   while (len--)
01359   {
01360     /* Load key */
01361     for (i = 3, j = 7; i >= 0; i--, j--)
01362     {
01363       AES->KEYLA = __REV(_key[j]);
01364       AES->KEYHA = __REV(_key[i]);
01365     }
01366 
01367     AES->CMD = AES_CMD_START;
01368 
01369     /* Wait for completion */
01370     while (AES->STATUS & AES_STATUS_RUNNING)
01371       ;
01372 
01373     /* Save encrypted/decrypted data */
01374     for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
01375     {
01376       _out[i] = __REV(AES->DATA) ^ _in[i];
01377     }
01378     _out += 4;
01379     _in  += 4;
01380   }
01381 }
01382 #endif
01383 
01384 
01387 #endif /* defined(AES_COUNT) && (AES_COUNT > 0) */
